alert.note: Alert for Fort Bend; Inland Harris (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued October 13 at 5:03AM CDT by NWS Houston - Galveston
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of north central Fort Bend and west central Harris Counties through 530 AM CDT... At 503 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Cypress, or 8 miles northeast of Katy, moving southeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Spring Branch West, Addicks Park Ten, Spring Branch North, Eldridge / West Oaks, Spring Valley, Hedwig Village, Westbranch, Cypress, Briar Forest, Spring Branch Central, Cinco Ranch, Addicks and Memorial. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
